name: King's Bounty: Legions | Sure Steps Pack
detailed_description:
Starter kit for the online strategy game King's Bounty: Legions, making the first steps in the game universe a lot easier.
By the kit and get a discount: King's Aura for 30 days, warrior's set and 100 Crystals.

King's Aura yields:

  • +100% gold;
  • +10% leadership;
  • +100% resource drop chance.

Fighter's Set includes:

  • 3 special auras for 3 days;
  • 7 scrolls each of 5 different spells.
